title: Western Hash
directions: Brown the beef. Add onions, tomatoes, celery or green pepper, rice and seasonings. Simmer 20 minutes, or until rice is tender. Add corn and mushrooms, if desired, and adjust seasonings. This is good served right out of a frying pan or piled into a casserole dish and topped with Cheddar or processed cheese.
ingredients: 1/2 cup celery or green pepper, chopped
salt, pepper, oregano, basil to taste
